name: Protecat
description:
(This was our third project for game jam practice. Our team name is inspired by this game.)

In 4721, some goats in the Rivet Forest mutated. Soon after that, the mutants develop violent and aggressive personalities that seek to attack any creatures nearby. 

One day, you saw a lot of cats trying to get across a section of the forest. As Nekokatto=sama, the God of Cats, you decided to use your divine powers to help the adorable creatures.

Keep the unhinged goats away from the pure, innocent, adorable, and cute cats. Protect them!!!

Controls

  • Left-click and hold the goats to drag them away from the cats.
  • Right-click to unleash your divine powers to stun the goats.
  • Survive as long as possible!
Credits
  • Roger Gilbert Fernandi - Game Designer
  • Angeline Cecilia - 2D Artist
  • Kensi Chandrawan - Game Designer & Programmer
  • Wilson Nathaniel - Game Programmer
  • Winson Allan Wijaya - Sound Engineer
